events.title: Sunday Service
events.description: Join us for our weekly Sunday service where we come together to worship, pray, and hear an inspiring message.

events.title: Bible Study
events.description: Dive deeper into the Word of God with our midweek Bible study sessions. All are welcome!

events.title: Community Outreach
events.description: Make a difference in our community by participating in our monthly outreach programs.

events.title: Youth Group
events.description: A fun and engaging group for teens to connect, learn, and grow in their faith.

events.title: Worship Night
events.description: An evening of powerful worship and praise. Come and experience the presence of God with us.

events.title: Prayer Meeting
events.description: Join us for a time of focused prayer and intercession for our church, community, and world.

events.title: Men's Fellowship
events.description: A time for powerful worship and praise. Come and experience the presence of God with us.
